Description.Name: Inferno Arrow IV Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Inferno Arrow IV missiles contain a napalm-like substance that coats their target in a gel which burns for a short period, applying Heat. Usage will lead to dangerous fires, even under no atmosphere conditions.

Inferno Arrow IV Ammo Bins each contain 5 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
